A

AccessibleConverter - Class in org.hatemile.jee
The AccessibleConverter class help to convert the HTML code in a code more accessible.
AccessibleConverter(String, String, Map<String, Boolean>, Locale, String, String) - Constructor for class org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleConverter
Initializes the converter.
AccessibleFilter - Class in org.hatemile.jee
The AccessibleFilter class is official implementation of Java EE Filter to convert HTML code of web application in a HTML code more accessible.
AccessibleFilter() - Constructor for class org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleFilter
 
ASSOCIATE_DATA_CELLS - Static variable in class org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleConverter
The filter-parameter to associate data cells with header cells.
ASSOCIATE_LABELS - Static variable in class org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleConverter
The filter-parameter to associate labels with fields.

CONFIGURATION_PATH - Static variable in class org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleFilter
The filter-parameter of configuration path of HaTeMiLe for Java.
convert() - Method in class org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleConverter
Convert HTML code in a HTML code more accessible.

The filter-parameter to display when a element has drag or drop events.

The filter-parameter to display the language of elements.

DISPLAY_TITLES - Static variable in class org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleConverter

DISPLAY_WAI_ARIA - Static variable in class org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleConverter
The filter-parameter to display the WAI-ARIA states of elements.
doFilter(ServletRequest, ServletResponse, FilterChain) - Method in class org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleFilter
Convert the HTML code of response in a HTML code more accessible.

O

org.hatemile.jee - package org.hatemile.jee
The org.hatemile.jee package contains the classes to convert the original response to client in a response more accessible for Java EE web applications.

P

PROVIDE_SPEAK_PROPERTIES - Static variable in class org.hatemile.jee.AccessibleConverter
The filter-parameter to provide a polyfill to speak and speak-as properties.

R

The ResponseWrapper class help to overwrite the original response of server.
